Pre-Game Insights: The Aiden Markram-led South Africa will look to win their maiden ICC T20 World Cup title when they begin their campaign against Sri Lanka on June 3, 2024.
South Africa has a strong squad with a mix of experienced and young players.
The batting lineup includes Quinton de Kock, Aiden Markram, Heinrich Klaasen, David Miller, Reeza Hendricks, Ryan Rickelton, and Tristan Stubbs.
The fast-bowling department features Kagiso Rabada, Anrich Nortje, Gerald Coetzee, Marco Jansen, and Ottniel Baartman.
Spinners Keshav Maharaj and Tabraiz Shamsi are also included in the squad.
Marco Jansen is a handy batsman but primarily serves as the opening bowler.
Most South African batters struggle against quality spin, especially on slow pitches.
